glsa.title: xine-lib: Heap-based buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: xine-lib is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow.

background.p: xine-lib is the core library package for the xine media player.

description.p: xine-lib does not check boundaries on data being read into buffers from DMO video files in code that is shared with MPlayer (DMO_VideoDecoder.c).

impact.p: An attacker could entice a user to play a specially crafted DMO video file with a player using xine-lib, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the player.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
